rmi.server

Class ClientControllerMultiCast

  • java.lang.Object
    • rmi.server.ClientControllerMultiCast
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, IClientController

    public final class ClientControllerMultiCast
extends java.lang.Object
implements IClientController
    a decorator for a collection of client controllers that delegates each method invocation to this internal collection of client controllers.
    Author:
    rverbist

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientControllerMultiCast(java.util.Collection<RmiClient<IClientController>> controllers)
      creates a new multicast controller
